features.title: AI Task Prioritization
features.description: Intelligent priority scoring based on deadlines, dependencies, team capacity, and historical patterns. The AI re-ranks your backlog automatically as conditions change.

features.title: Jira Two-Way Sync
features.description: Full bidirectional sync with Jira Cloud and Server. Changes made in either tool propagate instantly. Supports Epics, Stories, Sprints, and custom fields.

features.title: iOS Native App
features.description: Full-featured native iOS app with offline support, push notifications, Face ID authentication, and Siri Shortcuts integration for hands-free task management.

features.title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Customizable dashboards with 30+ chart types, velocity tracking, burn-down charts, team performance heatmaps, and exportable PDF/CSV reports.

features.title: Slack Smart Notifications
features.description: Context-aware Slack notifications that surface only what matters. AI filters notification noise and groups related updates into digest messages.

features.title: AI Meeting Summaries
features.description: Connect your calendar and let TaskFlow AI transcribe, summarize, and automatically create action items from your meetings. Integrates with Zoom, Meet, and Teams.

features.title: Android Native App
features.description: Native Android app with Material You design, widget support, offline sync, and deep Android integration including share sheets and app shortcuts.

features.title: GitHub PR Automation
features.description: Automatically link PRs to tasks, update task status when PRs merge, track code review cycles, and generate release notes from completed tasks.

features.title: No-Code Workflow Builder
features.description: Visual drag-and-drop workflow automation builder. Create complex multi-step automations with conditions, branches, and delays — no code required.

features.title: AI Project Forecasting
features.description: Machine learning model trained on your team's historical velocity to predict project completion dates with confidence intervals and risk flags.

features.title: Salesforce CRM Integration
features.description: Sync deals, contacts, and activities between Salesforce and TaskFlow AI. Auto-create tasks from CRM events and keep sales and ops teams aligned.

features.title: Team Capacity Planning
features.description: Visual capacity heatmap showing team availability, workload distribution, and over-allocation warnings. Drag tasks to rebalance load in real-time.

features.title: Offline Mobile Mode
features.description: Full offline functionality for iOS and Android — create, edit, and complete tasks without internet. Smart conflict resolution when reconnecting.

features.title: Custom AI Model Fine-Tuning
features.description: Enterprise feature to fine-tune TaskFlow's AI on your team's specific domain, terminology, and workflows for dramatically improved suggestions.

features.title: Public API v2
features.description: Redesigned REST + GraphQL API with webhooks, rate limit increases, SDK libraries for Python/Node/Go, and a developer sandbox environment.

features.title: Figma Design Sync
features.description: Link Figma frames to tasks, track design-to-dev handoff status, get notified when designs update, and embed live Figma previews in task detail views.
